guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Push-button switch
  • Smooth can metal with lid 2” - 4” in diameter
  • 8 Ohm mini speaker
  • Audio jack
  • circular plastic piece
Tools
  • Flathead screwdriver
  • Hammer
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Paper cutter, scissors, or utility knife
  • Soldering iron
